aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: Our Story
aboutPage.historyDescription: Founded with a vision to provide exceptional education, Boulough Al-Maram High School has been shaping young minds for over two decades. We believe in nurturing not just academic excellence, but also character, creativity, and leadership skills.
aboutPage.missionText: To provide quality education that develops critical thinking, creativity, and character in every student.
aboutPage.visionText: To be a leading institution that prepares students to become responsible global citizens and future leaders.
aboutPage.valuesText: Integrity, Excellence, Respect, Innovation, and Community are the pillars that guide everything we do.
aboutPage.academicProgramsDesc: Comprehensive curriculum covering sciences, humanities, languages, and arts with qualified teachers.
aboutPage.extracurricularDesc: Sports, arts, clubs, and community service opportunities for holistic development.
aboutPage.supportServicesDesc: Counseling, tutoring, and career guidance to support every student's journey.
